Text:
Unfortunately, none of the FLAC files are readable.
The FLAC decoder shows the message
*** Got Error Code 0:FLAC__STREAM_DECODER_ERROR_STATUS_LOST_SYNC
with every track.
Same problem with the Limited Edition of "The Utopian Experience" torrent.
Thank God the 320 kbps MP3 files are OK...
Weird. Rename the extention to Wav. and see how you go.
